trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous call to add a single task to a CloudJob.
trans-unit.target: Begins an asynchronous call to add a single task to a CloudJob.

trans-unit.source: If you are performing many of these operations in parallel and are seeing client side timeouts, please see: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.net.servicepointmanager.defaultconnectionlimit%28v=vs.110%29.aspx
trans-unit.target: If you are performing many of these operations in parallel and are seeing client side timeouts, please see: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.net.servicepointmanager.defaultconnectionlimit%28v=vs.110%29.aspx

trans-unit.source: The name of the WorkItem.
trans-unit.target: The name of the WorkItem.

trans-unit.source: The name of the job.
trans-unit.target: The name of the job.

trans-unit.source: The task to add.
trans-unit.target: The task to add.

trans-unit.source: A collection of BatchClientBehavior instances that are applied after the CustomBehaviors on the current object.
trans-unit.target: A collection of BatchClientBehavior instances that are applied after the CustomBehaviors on the current object.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task</codeEntityReference> object that represents the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task</codeEntityReference> object that represents the asynchronous operation.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to add the specified task list.
trans-unit.target: Begins an asynchronous operation to add the specified task list.

trans-unit.source: This operation is not atomic and may partially complete.
trans-unit.target: This operation is not atomic and may partially complete.

trans-unit.source: If you are performing many of these operations in parallel (or have specified a large MaxDegreeOfParallelism) and are seeing client side timeouts, please see: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.net.servicepointmanager.defaultconnectionlimit%28v=vs.110%29.aspx
trans-unit.target: If you are performing many of these operations in parallel (or have specified a large MaxDegreeOfParallelism) and are seeing client side timeouts, please see: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.net.servicepointmanager.defaultconnectionlimit%28v=vs.110%29.aspx

trans-unit.source: The name of the work item containing the target job.
trans-unit.target: The name of the work item containing the target job.

trans-unit.source: The name of the job to add tasks to.
trans-unit.target: The name of the job to add tasks to.

trans-unit.source: The set of tasks to add.
trans-unit.target: The set of tasks to add.

trans-unit.source: Controls the number of simultaneous parallel bulk add requests issued to the Batch service.
trans-unit.target: Controls the number of simultaneous parallel bulk add requests issued to the Batch service.

trans-unit.source: Each bulk add request contains at most <codeEntityReference>F:Microsoft.Azure.Batch.Constants.MaxTasksInSingleBulkAddTaskRequest</codeEntityReference> tasks in it.
trans-unit.target: Each bulk add request contains at most <codeEntityReference>F:Microsoft.Azure.Batch.Constants.MaxTasksInSingleBulkAddTaskRequest</codeEntityReference> tasks in it.

trans-unit.source: Also controls the cancellation token for the operation.
trans-unit.target: Also controls the cancellation token for the operation.

trans-unit.source: If one is not specified the default is used (see <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.Azure.Batch.BatchClientParallelOptions</codeEntityReference>.)
trans-unit.target: If one is not specified the default is used (see <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.Azure.Batch.BatchClientParallelOptions</codeEntityReference>.)

trans-unit.source: Container for artifacts populated by the file staging process.
trans-unit.target: Container for artifacts populated by the file staging process.

trans-unit.source: One entry is added for each bulk add task request issued to the Batch service.
trans-unit.target: One entry is added for each bulk add task request issued to the Batch service.

trans-unit.source: The amount of time after which the operation times out.
trans-unit.target: The amount of time after which the operation times out.

trans-unit.source: A collection of BatchClientBehavior instances that are applied after the CustomBehaviors on the current object.
trans-unit.target: A collection of BatchClientBehavior instances that are applied after the CustomBehaviors on the current object.

trans-unit.source: See <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.Azure.Batch.BulkAddTaskResultHandler</codeEntityReference> for the behavior which controls this operation's AddTask result handling.
trans-unit.target: See <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.Azure.Batch.BulkAddTaskResultHandler</codeEntityReference> for the behavior which controls this operation's AddTask result handling.

trans-unit.source: The <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.Azure.Batch.BulkAddTaskResultHandler</codeEntityReference> behavior is applied in order from the union of the CustomBehaviors on the current object and these additional behaviors.
trans-unit.target: The <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.Azure.Batch.BulkAddTaskResultHandler</codeEntityReference> behavior is applied in order from the union of the CustomBehaviors on the current object and these additional behaviors.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task</codeEntityReference> object that represents the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task</codeEntityReference> object that represents the asynchronous operation.
